description: As a member of a multinational project team, I independently developed a native iOS app using Swift. Having no prior knowledge with Swift nor native app development, I quickly and independently learned how to implement authentication, connect to a RestAPI, and read iPhone sensor data. I also gained insight into the design process and was able to actively contribute. Thanks to my structured way of working, I was able to meet milestones and report progress to the project manager in regular meetings.
I independently worked on existing native iOS applications to implement new features.
